author: Niall Patrick Walsh
title: Pattern Brutalist - An Illustrative Magazine
text:
Russian designer Sergey Lisovsky has created an online illustrative magazine inspired by Brutalist Architecture . Pattern Brutalistâ€™s first issue was published in January 2017, illustrating four Brutalist buildings across Russia , Germany , and Serbia . The buildings, dating between 1968 and 1980, are represented by Lisovsky using a collection of GIFs, photographs, and illustrations.

Pattern Brutalist also hosts a T-shirt printing service, allowing users to publically express their appreciation for an often-criticized architectural style. 




Check out the site for yourself here .

Via: Pattern Brutalist .
